Игра всех времён и народов! Советую любителям этого жанра.
One of the best First Person shooters of all time....Lots of action, Plenty of maps and mods to keep the experience going!

The best part about this game is that you have the option to play the regular team based match or to play one of thousands of mods adding a great variety to the game.  From surf, zombies, gun game, deathmatch, jailbreak, minigame, to just play killing, there is a huge variety of game types and maps to play.
Dis game is very good buy it,

Super jeu , même 8 ans après pour ma part , je m'amuse toujours dessus , la connexion est bonne , le jeu fluide , le gameplay dynamique et les graphismes , certe dépassé , moteur source oblige , ont tout de même un charme qui ne s'oublie pas ;  à acheter !

An amazing remake of the original Counter-Strike mod. Most of the original maps are back again, but with beautiful looking graphics, solid gameplay and some hidden easter eggs here and there. Overall, I'd give this game an 8/10.
